title: @Meddler, About Mid-season Update
body:
Hi

Just wanted to know if you think you guys will be able to work on rune for the Mid-season Update at the same time you work for Vanguard, or if Runes are not planned for Mid-season ?

Thanks in advance !

Also, if you don't mind, check [this post](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/EA5Gdp7s-rune-modification-idea) about runes.

replies.body: We do plan to do some work on the pre-game (both runes and masteries). That's a pretty long term project though, rather than a mid-season thing, both due to the amount of work needed to do it right and the need for the new client to be out and used by everyone.
So the (potential) 5 mastery pages and rune update is more likely preseason 8?

Pre-season would be the earliest yeah. Changes like those are disruptive enough we wouldn't want to drop them towards the end of a ranked season/just before Worlds. Mid-season's basically the last window of the year we target major changes for (though occasionally stuff will need to be done after that it's not something we plan for).

what about summoner spells?Any plans for those?

{{summoner:1}} {{summoner:21}} ?

Ever thought about returning {{summoner:13}}  and combining it with {{summoner:7}} ?
Making them obtainable ingame rather than in Lobby so Summoners can be taken reactively ? 

Personally I think League could learn a thing or two about flexibility and variety from SMITE's Relic system .

It's same to assume they won't work on runes for the mid-season. 

Pretty sure I read something about "not address those kind of changes (which will be different clearly different from now) during a season". 

They're going to work on it and the mastery tree. So let's wait for pre-season 8. (They finally understood that 3 trees isn't enough yeaah. #voteforsupports2k18)
